item.title: [Gulistān]
notes: Paper; heavy cream color laid paper laid horizontally with no visible chain lines or watermarks; text within elaborate ruled border of blue, gold, red, wide gold band with floral designs, red and black; elaborate unwan on fol.1b-2a in gold, blue red and black; margins of all pages completely decorated with floral design in gold; margins many pages are highlighed in various colors such as yellow, red, blue, green, etc. a few fol. have small paintings of 2 persons seated and talking with each other; text in black ink with rubrication and highlights in blue.
Nastaʻliq; 9 lines in written area 12.5 x 7 cm.
Some paintings of two seated persons speaking with eachother.
Library of Congress. Persian manuscript, M79.

Text disbound and pages entirely separated; original binding is brown leather with embossed gold medallions and border on sides and flap; envelope binding; lacking spine; binding in preservation box with manuscript.
Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress website.
summary: Fragmentary , highly decorated and illuminated copy of Saʻdī's Gulistān
medium: 61 leaves (9 lines), paper : disbound ; 27.4 x 17.6 cm

subject: uzbekistan
manuscripts, persian
tajikistan
washington (d.c.)
title: [Gulistān]
description: Fragmentary , highly decorated and illuminated copy of Saʻdī's Gulistān
